faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: If you have anything else you want to ask,

content.question: Is OpenCat available for iOS and macOS?
content.answer: Yes, OpenCat is available for both iOS and macOS devices. You can download the app from the App Store for iOS or visit our website to download the macOS version.

content.question: How secure is OpenCat?
content.answer: OpenCat takes security seriously. We use advanced encryption techniques to protect your data and ensure your privacy. Your conversations and personal information are safe with us.

content.question: Can I use OpenCat for business purposes?
content.answer: Yes, OpenCat can be used for both personal and business purposes. You can integrate OpenCat with various apps and use it to enhance communication and productivity in your business.

content.question: Is there a free trial for OpenCat Pro?
content.answer: Yes, there is a free trial for OpenCat Pro. You can try it out for 3 days before deciding whether to subscribe or not.

content.question: What is the best way to use OpenCat?
content.answer: There is not one best way to use OpenCat. It depends on your needs and preferences. You can use it for personal or business purposes, or both. You can also integrate it with various apps to enhance your productivity.

content.question: How secure is OpenCat?
content.answer: OpenCat takes security seriously. We use advanced encryption techniques to protect your data and ensure your privacy. Your conversations and personal information are safe with us.

content.question: How much does OpenCat cost?
content.answer: OpenCat is free to download and use. However, there are some premium features that require a subscription. You can choose to pay monthly or annually for these features.

content.question: How do I cancel my OpenCat subscription?
content.answer: To cancel your OpenCat subscription, simply visit our website and log in to your account. From there, you can manage your subscription and cancel it at any time.

content.question: Can I use OpenCat on multiple devices?
content.answer: Yes, you can use OpenCat on multiple devices. Simply download the app on each device and log in to your iCloud account. Your conversations and settings will be synced across all devices.
